languages.text: "Ах, да, к нам пожаловал еще и Вольный Торговец собственной персоной. Украсьте его кижками отсек, никакой пощады!"

traits.locale_text: Барк от Капитана, стадия абордажа 1, барк 3.

languages.text: "На офицерскую палубу нужны еще подкрепления — живее тащите свои туши туда!"
"We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"
languages.original_text: "На офицерскую палубу нужны еще подкрепления — живее тащите свои туши туда!"

traits.locale_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officer's deck, so drag your carcasses up there now!"
"We need more reinforcements on the officer's deck, so drag your carcasses up there now!"
"We need more reinforcements on the officer's deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

"We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

languages.text: "Wir brauchen Verstärkung auf dem Offiziersdeck. Schwingt eure Ärsche da rauf. Macht schon!"
languages.original_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir brauchen Verstärkung auf dem Offiziersdeck. Schwingt eure Ärsche da rauf. Macht schon!"

languages.text: « Il nous faut davantage de renforts sur le pont des officiers. Ramenez immédiatement vos carcasses là-haut ! »
languages.original_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

traits.locale_text: « Il nous faut davantage de renforts sur le pont des officiers. Ramenez immédiatement vos carcasses là-haut ! »

languages.text: «Necesitamos refuerzos en la cubierta de oficiales. ¡Moved el culo hasta allí a la de ya!».
languages.original_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

traits.locale_text: «Necesitamos refuerzos en la cubierta de oficiales. ¡Moved el culo hasta allí a la de ya!».

languages.text: “军官甲板需要更多增援，都赶紧给我挪腾起来，动作快！”
languages.original_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

traits.locale_text: “军官甲板需要更多增援，都赶紧给我挪腾起来，动作快！”

languages.text: 「士官デッキにもっと増援を送れ！這ってでもそこに行け。今すぐ！」
languages.original_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

traits.locale_text: 「士官デッキにもっと増援を送れ！這ってでもそこに行け。今すぐ！」

languages.text: "Subay güvertesinde daha fazla takviyeye ihtiyacımız var. Bir işe yarayın da desteğe gidin!"
languages.original_text: "We need more reinforcements on the officers' deck. Get your carcasses up there, now!"

traits.locale_text: "Subay güvertesinde daha fazla takviyeye ihtiyacımız var. Bir işe yarayın da desteğe gidin!"
